Accessibility Audit Pro

- Single HTML file with inline CSS and JS (no external dependencies).

- Main interface: drag-and-drop zone for text/URLs to audit (aria-dropeffect=copy, keyboard drag simulation via arrow keys).
- Audit categories as ARIA tabs (role=tablist): Contrast, Headings, Links, Forms, Images (5 tabs total).
